TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi User extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供对有关当前用户的信息的访问。

span.span: Provides access to the information about the current user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.User`对象公开的属性和方法提供对有关当前用户的信息的访问。The properties and methods exposed by the `My.User` object provide access to the information about the current user. "当前用户" 的含义在 Windows 和 Web 应用程序之间略有不同。The meaning of "current user" differs slightly between Windows and Web applications. 在 Windows 应用程序中，当前用户是运行应用程序的用户。In a Windows application, the current user is the user who runs the application. 在 Web 应用程序中，当前用户是访问应用程序的用户。In a Web application, the current user is the user who accesses the application. 属性还为当前用户提供对的访问。 `My.User`The `My.User` property also provides access to the for the current user. 主体对象表示用户的安全上下文，包括该用户的标识和用户所属的任何角色。A principal object represents the user's security context, including that user's identity and any roles to which the user belongs. 对于 Windows 应用程序，此属性提供的功能与属性相同。For Windows applications, this property provides the same functionality as the property. 对于 Web 应用程序，此属性提供的功能与 属性返回的对象的属性相同。For Web applications, this property provides the same functionality as the property of the object returned by the property. > [!NOTE] > 对于 windows 应用程序，默认情况下，只有**windows 应用程序**模板`My.User`上生成的项目会初始化该对象。For Windows applications, only projects built on the **Windows Application** template initialize the `My.User` object by default. 在所有其他 Windows 项目类型中，你必须通过`My.User`显式调用方法或将值分配给来初始化对象。In all other Windows project types, you must initialize the `My.User` object by calling the method explicitly or by assigning a value to . > [!NOTE] > 当`My.User`在 windows 95 和 windows 98 下运行时，对象无法报告有关当前 Windows 用户的信息，因为这些操作系统不支持登录用户的概念。The `My.User` object cannot report information about the current Windows user when run under Windows 95 and Windows 98 because those operating systems do not support the concept of a logged-on user. 您必须实现自定义身份验证， `My.User`才能在这些操作系统上使用该对象。You must implement custom authentication to use the `My.User` object on those operating systems. ## Examples 此示例检查应用程序是否正在使用 Windows 或自定义身份验证，并使用这些信息来`My.User.Name`分析属性。This example checks if the application is using Windows or custom authentication, and uses that information to parse the `My.User.Name` property. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyUser#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyUser/VB/Class1.vb#3)]

summary.span: 获取或设置当前主体（对基于角色的安全性而言）。

span.span: Gets or sets the current principal (for role-based security).

value.span: 一个 值，表示安全上下文。

span.span: A value representing the security context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以将`My.User.CurrentPrincipal`属性设置为实现接口的对象，以启用自定义身份验证。You can set the `My.User.CurrentPrincipal` property to an object that implements the interface to enable custom authentication. 在大多数项目类型中，此属性获取并设置线程的当前主体。In most project types, this property gets and sets the thread's current principal. 在 ASP.NET 应用程序中，此属性获取并设置当前 HTTP 请求的用户标识的安全信息。In an ASP.NET application, this property gets and sets the security information for the current HTTP request's user identity. 这是一个高级成员;除非您单击 "**全部**" 选项卡，否则它不会显示在 IntelliSense 中。This is an advanced member; it does not show in IntelliSense unless you click the **All** tab. ## 按项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|**是****Yes**| ## Examples 此示例检查应用程序是否正在使用 Windows 或自定义身份验证，并使用该信息`My.User.Name`来分析属性。This example checks if the application is using Windows or custom authentication, and uses that information to parse `My.User.Name` property. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyUser#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyUser/VB/Class1.vb#3)]

span.span: The caller does not have the permission required to set the principal.

Objects (Visual Basic)

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance void InitializeWithWindowsUser() cil managed

summary.span: 将线程的当前主体设置为启动应用程序的 Windows 用户。

span.span: Sets the thread's current principal to the Windows user that started the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用`My.User.InitializeWithWindowsUser`方法将线程的当前主体设置为启动应用程序的 Windows 用户。You can use the `My.User.InitializeWithWindowsUser` method to set the thread's current principal to the Windows user that started the application. 默认情况下，Windows 应用程序中的 Visual Basic 应用程序模型在启动时调用此方法。The Visual Basic Application Model in a Windows application calls this method at startup by default. 在其他项目类型中，你必须通过显式调用此方法或通过将值分配给来设置线程的当前主体。In other project types, you must set the thread's current principal by calling this method explicitly or by assigning a value to . 在 Windows 项目中， `My.User`对象基于线程的当前主体; 因此，此方法可以更改信息返回的信息。 `My.User`In Windows projects, the `My.User` object is based on the thread's current principal; therefore, this method can change the information `My.User` returns. 在 ASP.NET 应用程序中， `My.User`对象基于当前 HTTP 请求的用户标识，不受此方法的影响。In an ASP.NET application, the `My.User` object is based on the current HTTP request's user identity, and is unaffected by this method. > [!NOTE] > `My.User`对象的确切行为取决于应用程序的类型和运行应用程序的操作系统。The exact behavior of the `My.User` object depends on the type of application and on the operating system on which the application runs. 有关详细信息，请参阅类概述。For more information, see the class overview. 这是一个高级成员;除非您单击 "**全部**" 选项卡，否则它不会显示在 IntelliSense 中。This is an advanced member; it does not show in IntelliSense unless you click the **All** tab. ## 按项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|**是****Yes**|

span.span: Gets or sets the principal object representing the current user.

value.span: 一个表示当前用户的 对象。

span.span: An object representing the current user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在对象中，此属性对属性进行包装。 In the object, this property wraps the property. 在派生类中重写此方法以提供不同的行为。Override this method in a derived class to provide different behavior. 例如，属性将重写此属性。For example, the property overrides this property.

public: property bool IsAuthenticated { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否验证了用户。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the user has been authenticated.

value.span: 如果用户已经过验证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the user was authenticated; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.User.IsAuthenticated`属性允许代码确定当前用户是否已经过身份验证。The `My.User.IsAuthenticated` property allows your code to determine if the current user has been authenticated. > [!NOTE] > `My.User`对象的确切行为取决于应用程序的类型和运行应用程序的操作系统。The exact behavior of `My.User` object depends on the type of the application and on the operating system on which the application runs. 有关详细信息，请参阅类概述。For more information, see the class overview. ## 按项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|**是****Yes**| ## Examples 此示例在访问资源之前验证用户是否已经过身份验证。This example verifies that the user has been authenticated before accessing a resource. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyUser#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyUser/VB/Class1.vb#2)]

summary.span: 确定当前用户是否属于指定的角色。

span.span: Determines whether the current user belongs to the specified role.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance bool IsInRole(valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.BuiltInRole role) cil managed
Public Function IsInRole (role As BuiltInRole) As Boolean

param.name: role
param.span: 要检查其成员资格的内置 Windows 角色。

span.span: The built-in Windows role for which to check membership.

summary.span: 确定当前用户是否属于指定的角色。

span.span: Determines whether the current user belongs to the specified role.

returns.span: 如果当前用户是指定角色的成员，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current user is a member of the specified role; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.User.IsInRole`方法允许代码确定当前用户是否为指定角色的成员。The `My.User.IsInRole` method allows your code to determine if the current user is a member of the specified role. 采用字符串的`My.User.IsInRole`方法的重载提供对当前主体的方法的轻松访问。The overload of the `My.User.IsInRole` method that takes a string provides easy access to the method of the current principal. 采用枚举的 `My.User.IsInRole` 方法重载的行为方式不同，具体取决于当前主体。 `BuiltInRole`The overload of the `My.User.IsInRole` method that takes a `BuiltInRole` enumeration behaves differently, depending on the current principal. 如果它是 Windows 用户主体（），则此函数将转换`role`为等效的枚举并返回调用的结果。If it is a Windows user principal (), this function converts `role` to the equivalent enumeration and returns the result of calling . 如果当前主体是任何其他主体，则此函数会将中`role`的枚举值的名称传递到主体的方法。If the current principal is any other principal, this function passes the name of the enumeration value in `role` to the principal's method. > [!NOTE] > `My.User`对象的确切行为取决于应用程序的类型和运行应用程序的操作系统。The exact behavior of the `My.User` object depends on the type of the application and on the operating system on which the application runs. 有关详细信息，请参阅类概述。For more information, see the class overview. ## 按项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|**是****Yes**| ## Examples 此示例在访问资源前检查用户是否为管理员。This example checks if the user is an administrator before accessing a resource. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyUser#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyUser/VB/Class1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.User.IsInRole`方法允许代码确定当前用户是否为指定角色的成员。The `My.User.IsInRole` method allows your code to determine if the current user is a member of the specified role. 采用字符串的`My.User.IsInRole`方法的重载提供对当前主体的方法的轻松访问。The overload of the `My.User.IsInRole` method that takes a string provides easy access to the method of the current principal. 采用枚举的 `My.User.IsInRole` 方法重载的行为方式不同，具体取决于当前主体。 `BuiltInRole`The overload of the `My.User.IsInRole` method that takes a `BuiltInRole` enumeration behaves differently, depending on the current principal. 如果它是 Windows 用户主体（），则此函数将转换`role`为等效的枚举并返回调用的结果。If it is a Windows user principal (), this function converts `role` to the equivalent enumeration and returns the result of calling . 如果当前主体是任何其他主体，则此函数会将中`role`的枚举值的名称传递到主体的方法。If the current principal is any other principal, this function passes the name of the enumeration value in `role` to the principal's method. > [!NOTE] > `My.User`对象的确切行为取决于应用程序的类型和运行应用程序的操作系统。The exact behavior of the `My.User` object depends on the type of the application and on the operating system on which the application runs. 有关详细信息，请参阅类概述。For more information, see the class overview. ## 按项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|**是****Yes**| ## Examples 此示例在访问资源前检查用户是否为管理员。This example checks if the user is an administrator before accessing a resource. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyUser#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyUser/VB/Class1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Name As String
public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); };

span.span: Gets the name of the current user.
The name of the current user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用`My.User`对象获取有关当前用户的信息。You can use the `My.User` object to get information about the current user. 对用户进行身份验证的主体也会控制用户名的格式。The principal that authenticates the user also controls the format of the user name. 默认情况下，应用程序使用 Windows 身份验证，用户名的格式为 "域 \ 用户名"By default, an application uses Windows authentication, and the user name has the format DOMAIN\USERNAME. 主体的自定义实现不一定要使用相同的格式。A custom implementation of the principal does not necessarily use the same format. > [!NOTE] > 当`My.User.Name`在 windows 95 和 windows 98 下运行时，该属性将返回空字符串，因为这些操作系统不识别用户名。The `My.User.Name` property returns an empty string when run under Windows 95 and Windows 98 because those operating systems do not recognize user names. > [!NOTE] > `My.User`对象的确切行为取决于应用程序的类型和运行应用程序的操作系统。The exact behavior of the `My.User` object depends on the type of the application and on the operating system on which the application runs. 有关详细信息，请参阅类概述。For more information, see the class overview. ## 按项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|**是****Yes**| ## Examples 此示例检查应用程序是否正在使用 Windows 或自定义身份验证，并使用这些信息来`My.User.Name`分析属性。This example checks if the application is using Windows or custom authentication, and uses that information to parse the `My.User.Name` property. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyUser#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyUser/VB/Class1.vb#3)]
